name: eOneSoft
overview:
There are many people who cannot fully enjoy Hollywood movies due to the language barrier. Here is a solution! eOneSoft provides a new way for those people to watch Hollywood movies with subtitles in their own languages. Itâ€™s simple. First, go to www.mydvdsubtitle.com and download a DVD Subtitle Player. Second, play your favorite DVD with it. The player automatically detects what movie it is. Default subtitle is Korean but other language selection is possible.

Users can rent or purchase DVDs from Netflix, RedBox, Blockbuster, etc. However make sure that your rental DVD is on the list of www.mydvdsubtitle.com in your own language. eOneSoft continually adds movies and subtitles on their list. You can also request your favorite movie along with subtitle on the subtitle request section.

DVD Subtitle Player runs on PC, but users can watch the movie on the PC-connected LCD/LED TV with HDMI cable.

eOneSoft is located in Irvine, CA.
